name: Spinda
description: The Spot Panda Pokémon. All the Spinda that exist in the world are said to have utterly unique spot patterns. The shaky, tottering steps of this Pokémon give it the appearance of dancing.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to becoming confused.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.description: Attacks against this Pokémon have disadvantage when it is confused.

abilities.name: Contrary
abilities.description: Moves that affect this Pokémon's stats have the opposite effect. (For example, Defense Curl would lower AC by 4. Growl would increase its attack by +1)
